name: astro-hono-cloudflare-template
description: Fullstack template with Astro + React (client) and Hono (server) on Cloudflare

scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun run deploy:server && bun run deploy:client
scripts.install:all: bun install && bun --cwd client install && bun --cwd server install
